00001 /* tl.delta2.c -- 2nd order difference ------- */
00002 /* (C) Trond Lossius/BEK 2001                           */
00003 /* Last revision: 2001-03-21                            */
00004 /* 20031227 modified for OSX compiling by jasch <jasch@kat.ch> */
00005 
00006 /* 
00007  * jcom.delta2 (previously names tl.delta2)
00008  * External for Jamoma: calculate 2nd order difference
00009  * By Trond Lossius, Copyright © 2001-06
00010  * 20031227 initial port to OSX compiled by jasch <jasch@kat.ch>

00017 #include "Jamoma.h"
00018 
00019 typedef struct _delta2{                 // Data structure for this object 
00020         struct  object ob;                      // Must always be the first field; used by Max
00021         void    *obex;
00022         float   prev;                           // Previous value
00023         float   prev2;                          // 2nd last value received
00024         float   delta2;                         // 2nd order differential
00025         char    clearflag;
00026         void    *outlet;                        // Pointer to outlet. Need one for each outlet
00027 } t_delta2;
00028 
00029 
00030 // Prototypes for methods: need a method for each incoming message
00031 void *delta2_new(void);
00032 void delta2_bang(t_delta2 *x);
00033 void delta2_int(t_delta2 *x, long n);
00034 void delta2_float(t_delta2 *x, double f);
00035 void delta2_clear(t_delta2 *x);
00036 void delta2_set(t_delta2 *x, Symbol *s, short ac, Atom *setval);
00037 void delta2_assist(t_delta2 *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);
00038 
00039 
00040 // Globals
00041 t_class         *this_class;            // Required. Global pointing to this class
00042 
00043 
00044 /************************************************************************************/
00045 // Main() Function
00046 
00047 int main(void)
00048 {
00049         t_class *c;
00050         
00051         jamoma_init();
00052 
00053         // Define our class
00054         c = class_new("jcom.delta2",(method)delta2_new, (method)0L, (short)sizeof(t_delta2), (method)0L, 0, 0);
00055         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_delta2, obex));                    
00056                 
00057         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00058         class_addmethod(c, (method)delta2_bang,                         "bang",         A_CANT,         0);
00059         class_addmethod(c, (method)delta2_int,                          "int",          A_LONG,         0);
00060         class_addmethod(c, (method)delta2_float,                        "float",        A_FLOAT,        0);             
00061         class_addmethod(c, (method)delta2_assist,                       "assist",       A_CANT,         0); 
00062     class_addmethod(c, (method)delta2_set,                              "set",          A_GIMME,        0);  
00063     class_addmethod(c, (method)delta2_clear,                    "clear",        0);
00064         class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,         "dumpout",      A_CANT,         0);  
00065     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,    "quickref", A_CANT,             0);
00066         
00067         //finder_addclass("All Objects","jcom.delta2"); 
00068         //finder_addclass("Arith/Logic/Bitwise","jcom.delta2");
00069         
00070         // Finalize our class
00071         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00072         this_class = c;
00073         return 0;
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 /************************************************************************************/
00078 // Object Life
00079 
00080 void *delta2_new(void)
00081 {
00082         t_delta2 *x;
00083         
00084         
00085         x = (t_delta2 *)object_alloc(this_class);       // create the new instance and return a pointer to it
00086         if(x){
00087         object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x,NULL));       // dumpout      
00088                 x->outlet = floatout(x);                                // create the outlet
00089                 delta2_clear(x);                                                        // initilaize instance
00090         }       
00091         return (x);
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 /************************************************************************************/
00096 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00097 
00098 
00099 // BANG input
00100 void delta2_bang(t_delta2 *x)
00101 {
00102         outlet_float(x->outlet, x->delta2);
00103 }
00104 // INT input
00105 void delta2_int(t_delta2 *x, long n)
00106 {
00107         double f;
00108         
00109         f = (double)n;
00110         delta2_float(x,f);
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00114 // FLOAT input
00115 void delta2_float(t_delta2 *x, double f)
00116 {
00117         switch (x->clearflag) {
00118                 case 0:
00119                         x->delta2 = f - 2*x->prev + x->prev2;
00120                         x->prev2 = x->prev;
00121                         x->prev = f;
00122                         break;
00123                 case 1:
00124                         x->prev = f;
00125                         x->clearflag--;
00126                         break;
00127                 case 2:
00128                         x->prev2 = f;
00129                         x->clearflag--;
00130                         break;
00131         }
00132         delta2_bang(x);
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 // SET input
00137 void delta2_set(t_delta2 *x, Symbol *s, short ac, Atom *setval)
00138 {
00139         float f;
00140         
00141         if (ac) {
00142                 if (setval->a_type==A_LONG)
00143                         f = (float)setval->a_w.w_long;
00144                 else if (setval->a_type==A_FLOAT)
00145                         f = setval->a_w.w_float;
00146                 else goto err;
00147         }
00148         else
00149                 f=0;
00150         switch (x->clearflag) {
00151                 case 0:
00152                         x->delta2 = f - 2*x->prev + x->prev2;
00153                         x->prev2 = x->prev;
00154                         x->prev = f;
00155                         break;
00156                 case 1:
00157                         x->prev = f;
00158                         x->clearflag--;
00159                         break;
00160                 case 2:
00161                         x->prev2 = f;
00162                         x->clearflag--;
00163                         break;
00164         }
00165         return;
00166         
00167         err:
00168                 error("jcom.delta2: Wrong argument for set");
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00172 // CLEAR input
00173 void delta2_clear(t_delta2 *x)
00174 {
00175         x->clearflag = 2;
00176         x->delta2 = 0;
00177 }
00178 
00179 
00180 // Method for Assistance Messages
00181 void delta2_assist(t_delta2 *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst) // Display assistance messages
00182 {
00183         if(msg==1){ 
00184         sprintf(dst, "(int/float) function value");
00185         }
00186         else if(msg==2){
00187         sprintf(dst, "(float) 2nd order difference");
00188         }
00189 }
